featured.text: The exhibition offers viewers an opportunity to experience and appreciate the breadth of his remarkable artistic achievement.
Only in the leading museums can the objects be fully appreciated by the world.
They say people all over the world have only been able to fully appreciate ancient civilizations because these museums have provided access to these artistic objects.

definition.en_def: To recognize the value or significance of something; to express gratitude.
definition.example: I really appreciate your help with the project.
